name: VenousThromboembolism
title: Venous Thromboembolism
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnoses of venous thromboembolism (VTE), including a pulmonary embolism.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of proximal venous thromboembolism (VTE) of popliteal veins, femoral/superficial femoral veins, deep femoral veins, iliofemoral veins, iliac veins and inferior vena cava and pulmonary embolism.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis of venous thromboembolism (VTE) that is chronic or history of, located in the upper extremities, and veins not listed in the inclusion criteria.)
